::Repressor::

Repressor growled, looking in the distance at the ocean, which was now 
visible.

"Najah, don't let her go," he says. The heat was serioustly pissing 
him off, and complaining females didn't do much to raise a bot's 
temper.

"We walk up to the shore," he says, keeping his weapon aimed at her, 
"Then Zardus will send a shuttle to pick us up. Or he could send one 
now."

He activates his comm-link, requesting Zardus to send a shuttle.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lady Hawk was quickly losing her patience, She was being made to 
walk 
> across a dessert to a base that she still didn't know where it was. 
> She stopped walking for a moment using simple logic to appraise the 
> situation. "Excuse me Najah, we're both hot and irritable from this 
> sun, Would you please let me loose so my metal doesn't corrode? I'm 
> tired and depleted from this weather. I couldn't escape if I wanted 
> to." 
> 
> She turned to Repressor "You've had your weapon on me this whole 
> time, When are we going to make it to the new
